content: I'm working on implementing a typeclass for the interaction between tensor and inner product and I think I need a way to inductively define a family of types so that I can e.g. have axioms covering cases like \mathbb{C}^8 \otimes \mathbb{C}^2.
Lean supports inductive families. See section 7.7 of #tpil. You might also consider defining a family of types by recursion.
There's a little API for X^n, X a type, here in the liquid repo
